::Epyon/Hot Rod::

A look of anger crossed the Commander's face.
"Damnit! They will pay, I swear! Alpha, tell the others from our group.
When I get done with this IGL stuff, I intend to make the Decepticon's
burn in the pit. How dare they take a good Maximal and turn him into one
of them." 
He closed his link. The look of anger turned to one of sadness. Epyon
started walking. He just passed Khonkler without a word.

Hot Rod watched all this carefully. He had an idea what what had
happaned. He had seen that look many times. He had that look many times
himself. The look and feelings a Commander get when they loose someone
under their command. Hot Rod walks up to Epyon.
"It hurts, I know. I lost many under my command. Many of my friends in
the Great Wars. And every time, I felt that I had failed as Autobot
Commander. I had let them down. But the truth is its not your fault.
Blame the enemy. The ones truely at fault. Not yourself."

"But it is my fault Hot Rod. When Condor was taken by the Decepticons I
said we'll go after him. But then their was the Maximal City project and
now the IGL. I kept putting it off. Now he is worse then dead. Now he is
a Decepticon."
He turned towards the arena.
"I hope this starts soon. I'll take some anger out on them."

"You sure you wont be distracted, in there?" Asks Hot Rod.

"I'll be fine." Answers Epyon.
